mapper.insert: insert into member(license_no, email, name,hospital_name, hospital_addr, request_date) values (#{licenseNo}, #{email}, #{name}, #{hospitalName}, #{hospitalAddr} #{requestDate})
mapper.select: select id, license_no AS licenseNo, email, name, hospital_name AS hospitalName, hospital_addr AS hospitalAddr, request_date AS requestDate from vet_request
